title: Cranberry Pine Nut Bread
ingredients: ['3 teaspoons dried active baking yeast', '300ml warm water (45 degrees C)', '250g bread flour', '60g wheatgerm', '40g poridge oats', '2 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons butter, softened', '1 teaspoon salt', '240g dried cranberries', '70g pine nuts']
